description: Conference side Wrexham will play in all red shirt next season following an online vote by the club's co-owners.
title: Wrexham members select new kits for next season
title_page: Wrexham members select new kits for next season - BBC Sport
maintext:
Wrexham will play in all red shirt next season following an online vote by the club's co-owners.
The Conference club asked the club's almost 4,000 co-owners to help select the kit for next season.
Over 1,200 took part in a poll which gave fans the option of an all red or a red and white striped shirt as their home strip for the 2015/2016 season.
Fans also voted in favour of a yellow change shirt rather than a blue and white stripped kit.
